alert.note: Alert for Robertson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 08 at 3:26PM CDT until July 08 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL DAVIDSON...NORTHEASTERN CHEATHAM AND SOUTHERN ROBERTSON COUNTIES... At 326 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Greenbrier, or near Springfield, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Millersville, Greenbrier, Coopertown, Ridgetop, Cross Plains, Joelton and Pleasant View. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 24 and 37. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
